sentence.Network_en: The counselors will gladly baby-sit during their free time.
sentence.Network_cn: 空闲时这些顾问也会乐意照看一下孩子。

sentence.Network_en: She'd gladly have gone anywhere to get away from the cottage.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要能离开那个小屋，去哪儿她都乐意。

sentence.Network_en: I'd gladly swap places with mummy any day.
sentence.Network_cn: 什么时候让我和妈妈交换角色我都愿意。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 综合英语单词表(第二册下) - 豆丁网 ... footnote n. 补充；脚注 gladly ad. 高兴地，乐意地 goad v. 促使，驱使.
求英文中表达感情的形容词！！！！！！_百度知道 ... glad to meet you 很高兴认识你 gladly 高兴地 gleesome 极为高兴的.
He gladly accepted their invitation ., 他欣然接受了他们的邀请.

if an infected deer dies in the forest and nobody is there to see it , plenty of coyotes , bobcats and other carnivores will and they will gladly scavenge what remains of the wasted carcass .如果受感染的鹿死在森林中没有人发现，许多草原狼、美国大山猫与其他肉食动物将会很高兴地吃掉尸体剩下的部份。

list.abs: he gladly consented to the extension of the loan ., 他很乐意地同意延长贷款偿还期.
She suggested it , and I gladly accepted., 那是她提出的建议 , 我欣然接受了.
many people mistake me for an extrovert when I gladly introduce myself to strangers join in group discussions .当我高兴地向陌生人做自我介绍，并加入团体讨论时，许多人误认为我是一个性格内向的人。
guests came to visit us today ( again ) , all the same , we ate gladly together again .今天又有客人来了，同样，我们又美美地吃了一顿。
local authorities gladly accepted japanese help in the crisis ., 地方政府欣然接受日本人在危难中的协助.

entry.def: If you are glad about something, you are happy and pleased about it.

example.ex: I'm glad I relented in the end...
example.tran: 我很高兴自己的态度最终缓和了下来。

example.ex: The people seem genuinely glad to see you...
example.tran: 这些人见到你好像发自内心地感到喜悦。

entry.def: If you say that you will be glad to do something, usually for someone else, you mean that you are willing and eager to do it.

example.ex: I'll be glad to show you everything...
example.tran: 我将很乐意向你们展示一切。

example.ex: We should be glad to answer any questions.
example.tran: 我们愿意回答任何问题。

auth_sentence.content: I gladly acknowledge the quality of their work.

Sentence.sentence: We are both frequent theater-goers," Aaron explains, " and I'll gladly pay for two tickets, just to have pass company it plays in concerts , but she won't go anywhere unless she can pay her own way

sentences.en: I gladly avail myself of your offer.
sentences.cn: 我很乐意接受你的帮忙。
他欣然接受了他们的邀请。
